cards.title: AI Strategy & Design
cards.description: Comprehensive AI roadmap including readiness assessment, strategy development, and custom solution design tailored to your business goals.

cards.title: AI Implementation
cards.description: End-to-end deployment of AI solutions with minimal disruption. We handle development, integration, and staff training.

cards.title: AI Resources & Talent
cards.description: Access pre-vetted AI engineers, data scientists, and ML specialists for short-term projects or long-term team augmentation.

cards.title: AI Support & Maintenance
cards.description: Keep your AI solutions running at peak performance with ongoing updates, monitoring, model retraining, and technical support.

cards.title: Cut Costs with AI
cards.description: Automate repetitive tasks and reduce operational overhead by up to 40% with intelligent AI solutions tailored for SMBs.
